statements: SELECT * FROM solar_power_technologies;
SELECT cell_technology_name, efficiency FROM solar_power_technologies;
SELECT manufacturer, production_capacity FROM solar_power_technologies WHERE efficiency > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM solar_power_technologies WHERE manufacturer='Solar1';
SELECT cell_technology_id, cell_technology_name FROM solar_power_technologies ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM solar_power_technologies ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT cell_technology_name, manufacturer FROM solar_power_technologies WHERE production_capacity > 10000;
SELECT cell_technology_name, efficiency, production_capacity FROM solar_power_technologies WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY production_capacity ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, efficiency FROM solar_power_technologies WHERE efficiency >= 20 AND production_capacity <= 5000;
SELECT * FROM solar_power_technologies WHERE cell_technology_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM solar_technologies;
SELECT technology_name, efficiency FROM solar_technologies;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_performance WHERE technology_id = 1;
SELECT technology_name, power_output FROM solar_technologies ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT technology_name, panel_area FROM solar_panel_performance ORDER BY panel_area ASC;
SELECT technology_name, efficiency FROM solar_technologies;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_performance WHERE technology_id = 3;
SELECT panel_id, panel_area, power_output FROM solar_panel_performance ORDER BY panel_area DESC, power_output ASC;
SELECT technology_name, panel_area, power_output FROM solar_technologies JOIN solar_panel_performance ON solar_technologies.technology_id = solar_panel_performance.technology_id;
SELECT DISTINCT technology_name FROM solar_technologies WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM solar_cells;
SELECT cell_id, manufacturer, efficiency FROM solar_cells ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT panel_id, panel_area, rating FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_area > 20;
SELECT cell_id, MAX(efficiency) FROM solar_cells GROUP BY cell_id;
SELECT data_id, panel_id, production FROM performance_data WHERE production > 100 ORDER BY production DESC, panel_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM solar_cells WHERE efficiency > 18.5 ORDER BY technology ASC;
SELECT panel_id, panel_area FROM solar_panels WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY panel_area DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, AVG(efficiency) AS average_efficiency FROM solar_cells GROUP BY manufacturer ORDER BY average_efficiency DESC;
SELECT p.panel_id, pd.date, pd.production FROM performance_data pd JOIN solar_panels p ON pd.panel_id = p.panel_id WHERE pd.production > 500 ORDER BY pd.production DESC;

SELECT s.cell_id, s.technology, p.panel_area, p.rating, pd.production FROM solar_cells s JOIN solar_panels p ON s.cell_id = p.cell_id JOIN performance_data pd ON p.panel_id = pd.panel_id WHERE p.panel_area * s.efficiency > 15 AND pd.production < 1000 ORDER BY pd.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT panel_name, technology_type, efficiency FROM solar_panels ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM installations WHERE location='New York';
SELECT panel_name, efficiency, technology_type FROM solar_panels WHERE technology_type='Mono Crystalline' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE technology_type = 'Monocrystalline' ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT panel_name, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE height > 1.5 AND width > 1.5;
SELECT location, capacity FROM installations WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT SUM(energy_output) AS total_energy_output, AVG(efficiency) AS average_efficiency FROM performance_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT panel_name, description FROM solar_panels INNER JOIN installations ON solar_panels.panel_id = installations.panel_id INNER JOIN maintenance_logs ON installations.installation_id = maintenance_logs.installation_id WHERE date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM SolarCells;
SELECT cell_technology, efficiency FROM SolarCells ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT cell_id, date_installed FROM SolarCells WHERE efficiency > 20;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE date_produced BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT cell_id, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SolarCells WHERE efficiency > 15.0 ORDER BY date_installed DESC;
SELECT cell_technology, efficiency FROM SolarCells WHERE date_installed > '2021-01-01';
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE cell_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE energy_produced BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT cell_id, performance_rating, performance_date FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating = 'Excellent';
